comments.comment: Chewaraya kiyanneth reddak witharai.. danthiyana eka chewarayak wath budunge kale indan thibba ewa newei. kohe hari factory ekeka machine walin mahana redi kallak witharai. Eka porawagaththu hama horekutama wanndinne modayo.. chewareta newei eka porawagenna inna manyssayage yaha gunayata karunawata mithriyata garu karanna wandinna.  Manussayai wadagath. Cheware dagena gon harak thakatheru hora game dena dabaraya wage horu gal gahala panna ona. Oyewage ewn budunge darmaya hallu karala iththek karan cheware porawagena salli hoyanawa. Ape modayo sadu kiyala wandinawa. Nyanasara hamuduruwane oba wahansela wath mewage horu me bududahama desapalanet bilidena pal horu pannala dala ape rata berala benna.
